text: Vuisternens-devant-Romont is a municipality of the district Glâne in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == History == It was created on 1 January 2003 when the municipalities of Estévenens, Villariaz, Lieffrens, Sommentier, Les Ecasseys, La Magne and La Joux joined together to become the new municipality, Vuisternens-devant-Romont. Since 2004, La Neirigue became a part of Vuisternens-devant-Romont. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Municipalities in Glâne
title: Vuisternens-devant-Romont
